meanings.definition: Having a strange or odd quality
meanings.sent1: The rummiest thing happened today when my cat started meowing at the birds outside.
meanings.sent2: The old house on the corner always had the rummiest decorations during Halloween.
meanings.sent3: It was the rummiest sight to see a dog wearing sunglasses and a hat.
meanings.sent4: Her painting was the rummiest blend of colors I had ever seen, like a rainbow on fire.
meanings.sent5: The rummiest cloud in the sky looked like a giant fluffy elephant floating above us.

meanings.sent1: After spinning around too much, the room felt rummiest to me, like a merry-go-round.
meanings.sent2: He stumbled out of the bar looking the rummiest I had ever seen him.
meanings.sent3: The catnip made the kitten act the rummiest, like a tiny drunkard.
meanings.sent4: The stars seemed to dance in the rummiest way after a few sips of the special punch.
meanings.sent5: The rummiest smell of alcohol lingered in the air, making me dizzy just from breathing.

meanings.sent1: The rummiest toy in the store fell apart as soon as I touched it.
meanings.sent2: The rummiest sandwich I ever had was stale and tasted like cardboard.
meanings.sent3: His attempt at a joke was the rummiest, leaving everyone confused instead of laughing.
meanings.sent4: The rummiest excuse for being late was blaming it on a herd of turtles crossing the road.
meanings.sent5: The rummiest painting in the gallery looked like a child's scribble rather than art.
